title: About Ten10
subtitle: Advanced system for managing tithes and simple, accurate financial budget management

appInfo.title: About the Application
appInfo.description: Ten10 is an advanced tithe management system that includes automatic calculations, smart reminders, and detailed reports. The system was developed in partnership with the Torah Adam Institute and is halachically approved. The project was born following the success of the Excel table series for tithe and chomesh calculations published by the institute over a long period, which gained widespread public popularity with over 3,500 orders in Israel. At the request of many, the institute decided to collaborate with an expert programmer to build a completely new system, offering an improved user experience, advanced functions, and additional diverse options for accurate and convenient tithe management.

institute.title: Torah Adam Institute
institute.description: The Torah Adam Institute is the leader in practical halacha. The institute guided the development of Ten10 and approved the accuracy of halachic calculations, ensuring the system meets all halachic requirements.
institute.supportDescription: The institute operates as a non-profit organization and relies on donations. Every donation helps continue the important work.

team.title: Development Team
team.description: Ten10's development team consists of experienced developers and leading programmers in the technology field. The team works in close collaboration with the Torah Adam Institute to ensure complete halachic accuracy.

footer.title: Thank you for using Ten10
footer.description: We are proud to provide an advanced tool for managing tithes and simple, accurate financial budget management that helps give tithes and chomesh accurately and conveniently. Your feedback is very important to us!
